tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robots (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_name VARCHAR(255),
  model_3d BYTEA,
  design_specifications TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RobotDesigns (
    design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    design_name VARCHAR(255),
    design_file BLOB,
    CONSTRAINT fk_robot_id FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RobotDesigns (
  design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  design_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  design_version INT NOT NULL,
  design_file BLOB NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RobotSpecifications (
  spec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  spec_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  spec_weight DECIMAL(10,2),
  spec_height DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RobotModels (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DesignSpecifications (
    spec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    spec_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    spec_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES RobotModels(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ModelParts (
  model_id INT,
  part_id INT,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES RobotModels(model_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES RobotParts(part_id),
  PRIMARY KEY (model_id, part_id)
);
